mapper.select: select m.menu_id as menuId, m.menu_name as menuName, m.menu_component as menuComponent, m.menu_path as menuPath, m.menu_icon as menuIcon, m.menu_parent_id as menuParentId, m.menu_status as menuStatus from cy_menu m inner join cy_permission p on m.menu_id = p.menu_id where p.role_id = #{roleId} and m.menu_status = 1 and m.menu_is_hidden = 0 order by m.menu_sort desc
